entries.journal_entry_description: Nagem is short-handed. She wants you to go and retrieve a hyperdrive intermix chamber that one of her probe droids has located.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Nagem's probe droid located an intact hyperdrive intermix chamber. You need to go and salvage it.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Looks like some scanvagers where waiting for you.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: You got Nagem's hunk of scrap and took out some nasty customers in the process. Now to get the junk back to Nagem.
